T02n1399u_001:35: tadeva bodhitacittaṃ tena nālapatraṣaṇḍādikrameṇa niṣpādayan tadarthamāha |

T02n1399u_001:40: lalaṇā rasaṇā ravi sasi tuḍia veṇṇa vi pāse |

T02n1399u_001:69: pañca mahābhūā via ai samāggīe jaia |

T02n1399u_001:109: tejasa indriyaṃ cakṣuḥ tasya viṣayo rūpam |
T02n1399u_001:110: vāyorindriyaṃ tvak tasya viṣayaḥ sparśaḥ bhagaliṅgādisparśaviṣayaḥ |
T02n1399u_001:111: ākāśasya indriyaṃ śrotraṃ tasya viṣayo hi śabdaḥ niyamena śabdameva gṛhṇāti nānyat |
T02n1399u_001:114: khiti jala jalaṇa pavaṇa gaaṇa vi māṇaha |

T02n1399u_001:120: pāpa-puṇṇa-rahie kuccha ṇāhi kāṇhu phuḍa kahie | 10 | | |

T02n1399u_001:137: kṛṣṇaṃ śyāmaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ śavalaṃ kṛcchraduḥkhaṃ jātamiti darśayannāha -

T02n1399u_001:142: bahirnirgatasarvvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvenākāracakramāracya aśūnyañca śarīre kalpitayogena rāgāntamapi dhiyā praviśya tadā ca mūlībhūtā anayoḥ śūnyāśūnyayormadhye re mūḍha kimapi tattvaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ na jñātamityarthaḥ |
T02n1399u_001:144: sahaja ekku para atthi tahi phuḍa kāṇhu parijāṇai |

T02n1399u_001:150: aha ṇa gamai ūi ṇa jāi |

T02n1399u_001:162: vimala salila sosa jāi jai kālāgni paiṭṭhai | 14 | | |
T02n1399u_001:172: tasya kandaraṃ kuharaṃ tadeva pañcānāmagocaratvād gambhīraṃ tatra kimbhavatītyāha |

T02n1399u_001:188: ataeva bhaṇati kṛṣṇavajraḥ devānāmalakṣitatvāt śrāvakādīnāmasādhāraṇaṃ yogināmagocaraṃ paramaṃ tattvaṃ duravagāhaṃ ko manasi vyavalokayati |

T02n1399u_001:204: cittavajratathāgatā devī krodhagaṇe labhyateti maṇdalacakravimuktaḥ sahajakṣaṇe tiṣṭhāmiti sambandhaḥ |

T02n1399u_001:208: sahaje ṇiccala jeṇa kia samarase ṇiamaṇa-rāa |

T02n1399u_001:213: tadabhyāsaparyyantena vṛttyāgaman tat kṣaṇāt jarāmaraṇaṃ vihāya siddho bhavati |
T02n1399u_001:215: tathā ca śrīsamāje- arūṇodgamavelāyāṃ siddhyante nātra saṃśaya |

T02n1399u_001:225: yatra yāvanmanaścittaṃ manasāṃ caturaśītiprakṛtayo na kimapi kriyate |

T02n1399u_001:235: atasteṣāṃ karaṇḍakaṇṭhānāṃ saiva rasaṃ bodhanaṃ nijaprabhorvajradharasya veśa ābharaṇaṃ alaṅkāraḥ śobhanamiti yāvat |
T02n1399u_001:243: jai pavaṇa-gamaṇa-duāre dida tālā vi dijjai |
T02n1399u_001:244: jai tasu ghorāndhāre maṇa daviho kijjai |
T02n1399u_001:245: jiṇa raaṇa uare jai so varū amvarū chuppai |

T02n1399u_001:249: pavanasya gamanadvāraṃ tatrārddha yadidamabheditamabhedyatālasaṃpuṭīkaraṇaṃ candrasūryyayormārganirodhaṃ dīyate |
T02n1399u_001:250: yadi tasmin ghorāndhakāre manorvṛttirbodhicitaṃ tadeva mahāsukhaprakāśakatvāt dīpaḥ kriyate tajjinaratnaṃ aghaūrddhapadmaṃ varagagaṇākhyamavadhūtī spṛśati tamāliṅgayati |
T02n1399u_001:252: bhaṇati kṛṣṇavajraḥ tadevaṃ bhavaṃ bhujyamāne sati pañcakāmaguṇānubhavaṃ kurvyāṇe nirvvāṇaṃ mahāmudrāpadaṃ sākṣādbhavati |
T02n1399u_001:254: jo ṇatthu ṇiccala kiau maṇa so dhammakkhara pāsa |

T02n1399u_001:258: sa purūṣo vajrābjayoge niścalīkṛtya mano bodhicittaṃ pūrvvoktalakṣaṇānāhatākṣara mahāmudrāpārśve pavano'pi prāṇāvāyurbadhyate |
T02n1399u_001:262: te dhātavaḥ kṣīṇatarā babhūvurvāyuḥ svatantro yata eṣa eva |
T02n1399u_001:263: sā kāminī kāmuka [ ka ] ṇṭalagnā adyāpi kiṃ kāyasukhaṃ suhṛnme | |
T02n1399u_001:275: īdṛśena mantranayopadeśena yadi sphuṭametat jñānamudrā siddhayatisampadyate tadā kiṃ bhavatītyāha |
T02n1399u_001:276: prāṇavāyorgṛhiṇyāḥ tasyā jñānamudrāyāḥ śavarīrūpāyāḥ sthiraṃ bādhyate niścalībhavatītyarthaḥ |
T02n1399u_001:277: nanu śavarī tāvat patitā śavaraḥ punaḥ kiṃbhūtaḥ kutra vasatītyāha |
T02n1399u_001:278: varagiri-sihara uttuṅga muṇi savare jahi kia vāsa |
T02n1399u_001:279: ṇau so laṃghia pañcāṇaṇehi karivara duria āsa | 25 | | |
T02n1399u_001:281: varagiriḥ sa evaṃ pūrvoktagiristhāne śikhara śṛṅga tadeva mahāsukhādhāratvāt uttuṅga mahat tatra śavareṇa vajradhareṇa bhagavatā kṛto vāsaḥ kiṃviśiṣṭa ityāha |
T02n1399u_001:282: na tallaṅghito nākrāntaḥ keneti pañcamaṇḍalātmakaprāṇapavanakarivarasya cittagajendrasya dūrataramiti |
T02n1399u_001:283: ehu so girivara kahia mai ehuso mahāsuha-ṭhāva |
T02n1399u_001:284: ekku raaṇi sahajakhaṇa lavbhai mahāsuha jāva | 26 | | | (161)
T02n1399u_001:288: sa eva girivaraḥ kathito mayā kṛṣṇavajreṇa nānyena kathitaṃ madvidhā apare kathituṃ [ na ] samartha iti vivṛtyā etadeva mahāsukhasthānaṃ pūrvoktameva sthalī etasmin |
T02n1399u_001:289: tadeva mahāsukhalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ kurūta yāvaccaturddaśabhūmīśvaro vajradharapadaṃ na labhyate |
T02n1399u_001:291: sava jagu kāa-vāa-maṇa mili viphurai tahiso dūre |
T02n1399u_001:292: so ehu bhaṅge mahāsuha ṇivvāṇa ekku re | 27 | | |
T02n1399u_001:295: sarve te vairocanādayastathāgatā rūpādipañcaskandhasvarūpeṇa jagadākārāsteṣāṃ kāyavākcittaṃ pṛthivyādirūpeṇa vairocanādidevyāhi tābhirmilitamekalolībhūtaṃ mahārāgādi saṃbodhilakṣaṇavajradharaśarīraṃ kṣīranīranyāyena ebhiḥ samarasībhāvaḥ tatraiva vajradharaśarīre tadeva kāyavākcittādikaṃ jalataraṅganyāyena visphurati |
T02n1399u_001:297: ekku ṇa kijjai manta ṇa tanta |
T02n1399u_001:299: ṇia ghare ghariṇī jāva ṇa majjai |
T02n1399u_001:303: ekamapi na kriyate mantro na mantrajāpaḥ tantro na tantrapāṭha nijagṛhiṇī jñānamudrā śucitvāvabhāsā sadgurūpadeśena tāṃ gṛhītvā keli krīḍāṃ kurvatā yoginā stheyamiti |
T02n1399u_001:307: yogīndraiḥ sevanīyā paramajinasutaiḥ sevitā yā ca buddhaiḥ | |
T02n1399u_001:308: sā jñānārcci pravṛddhā dahati saviṣayaṃ māravṛndaṃ samastam |
T02n1399u_001:309: rāgādiñcāpi kāye dahati samasukhaṃ yogināṃ varṣayogāt | |
T02n1399u_001:310: etasyāṃ bhagavatyām āsaktena yoginā mantratantragraho na karttavyamiti |
T02n1399u_001:311: nijagṛhiṇī mahāmudrārūpaṃ tatra gṛhiṇī saiva jñānamudrāyāḥ yāvanna majjati na līyate tāvat kiṃ pañcavarṇasaṃsthānaiḥ kiṃ kriyata iti |
T02n1399u_001:312: asyā eva mahāmudrāyāḥ phalaṃ sādhanopāyatvaṃ niścayena darśayan punastadevāha |
T02n1399u_001:316: vohi ki lavbhai eṇa vi dehe | 29 | | |
T02n1399u_001:318: anena bāhyabhūtena homena maṇḍalakarmaṇā anudinaṃ tiṣṭhasi kiṃ mūḍha manasā [ mū ] ḍha [ kena ] prakāreṇa |
T02n1399u_001:320: tayā vinā sadaiva rāgamayaḥ tarūṇyā mahāmudrayā saha ratirantaramanavacchinnānurāgastena vinā kiṃ mahāmudrā labhyate anena manuṣyadeheneti |
T02n1399u_001:321: manuṣyadehaṃ vihāya dehāntareṇa bodhirna syāt kiṃ satyametat |
T02n1399u_001:322: kutaḥ narā vajradharākārā yoṣito vajrayoṣitaḥ iti vacanāt tasyāḥ phalamāha |
T02n1399u_001:323: je vujjhia virala sahajakhaṇa kāhi vea-purāṇa |
T02n1399u_001:324: te tuḍia visaa-viappa jagu re asesa parimāṇa | 30 | | | (163)
T02n1399u_001:327: yena pratītaṃ sadoditaṃ mahāmudrāsvarūpaṃ sahajalakṣaṇaṃ pūrvvasmāt khyātamāgamaṃ tena yoginā sakalavikalpāvaśeṣamano ahaṃkāra sphoṭitamunmūlitamityarthaḥ
T02n1399u_001:328: je kia ṇiccala maṇa-raaṇa ṇia ghariṇī lai ettha |
T02n1399u_001:329: soi vājira ṇāhu re mayi vutta paramattha | 31 | | |
T02n1399u_001:332: yena kṛtaṃ pracaṇḍālī cālayitumaśakyatvāt niścalaṃ manoratnaṃ bodhicittaṃ nijagṛhiṇī iyameva divyamudrā tatraiva evaṃkāre mahāsukhasthāne sa eva vajrī vajradharo nāthaḥ kāyavākcittaprabhuḥ |
T02n1399u_001:336: jima loṇa vilijjai pāṇiehi tima ghariṇī lai citta |
T02n1399u_001:337: amarasa jāi takkhaṇe jai puṇu te sama ṇitta | 32 | | |
T02n1399u_001:340: yathā lavaṇaṃ vilīyate pānīyena tathā gṛhiṇī jñānarūpiṇī gṛhītvā cittaṃ samarasamekalolībhāvaṃ gacchet tatkṣaṇaṃ yadi punastayā sukhacittarūpayā gṛhiṇyā samaṃ nityaṃ avasthito bhavatīti etena yuganadvā vajrasattvā darśitā iti |
